salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id, FirstName, LastName, Phone, Email ,AccountId, Account.Name from Contact where Id = ':contactId'

salesforce:query.doc:name: Get Account Data
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id, Name, Type, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, ShippingStreet, ShippingCity, ShippingState, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingCountry, Phone, Fax, AccountNumber, Website, Industry, AnnualRevenue, NumberOfEmployees, Description, Rating from Account where id = ':accountId'

salesforce:query.doc:name: Get Cases
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id,CaseNumber, Subject, Priority, Status, AccountId, Account.Name, ContactEmail from case where ContactEmail = ':contactEmail'

salesforce:query.doc:name: Get Opportunities of Account
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id,name,Amount,Probability, StageName, CloseDate, AccountId, Account.Name from Opportunity where AccountId = ':accountId'

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json var value = payload."0" var cases = payload."1".payload var opportunities = payload."2".payload var contactInfo = vars.ContactInfo[0] --- { "num": contactInfo.Id, "email": contactInfo.Email, "firstName": contactInfo.FirstName, "lastName": contactInfo.LastName, "phone": contactInfo.Phone, "client":{ "name": value.payload[0].Name, "description": value.payload[0].Description, "accountNumber": value.payload[0].AccountNumber, "billingCity": value.payload[0].BillingCity, "billingStreet": value.payload[0].BillingStreet, "billingState": value.payload[0].BillingState, "numberOfEmployees": value.payload[0].NumberOfEmployees, "industry": value.payload[0].Industry, "type": value.payload[0].Type, "phone": value.payload[0].Phone, "annualRevenue": value.payload[0].AnnualRevenue }, "opportunities": opportunities map (item,index)->{ "name":item.Name, "amount":item.Amount, "probability":item.Probability, "stageName":item.StageName, "closeDate":item.CloseDate },
"cases": cases map (item, index) -> { "subject": item.Subject, "priority": item.Priority, "contactEmail": item.ContactEmail, "status": item.Status } }
